page.title: 14MY HOUSE; ABBEY WOOD (2)
page.content: A few yards down the landing is my brothers' bedroom. That's my favourite, it overlooks the garden. (Mine overlooks the street.) They both have blue covers on their beds and their is always tidy. Next is the toilet. It is small, cold, and poky. The bathroom is quite long and the bath is an olive colour, so is the sink and the carpet. We have 14 stairs which curl round and can be dangerous. The kitchen is the longest. It is bright and warm. The table is at the end of the room. The passage is long. At the end on the left is the front room. As you go inside it is quite noisy. The room is big and long and we have a television and video in one corner and a stereo in the other. That is my house. Kerry Wallace Age 11yrs.
